Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>、あんたのその長髪だけどさ、 めんどうが多いなら、バッサリ切ったらどうだ？？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey <Eugene>, if your hair is a bother because it's too long, why don't you cut it?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえのほうこそ、少しは 整えたらどうなんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: How about you try fixing up your own hair a little?

Entry.JapaneseText: ダメダメ！ おれのポリシーは<Cyan>自然体！<White> 髪の毛も自然にボーボーが一番だ！
Entry.EnglishText: No no! I have a policy of keeping it <Cyan>natural<White>! Having hair that's naturally shaggy can't be beat!
What kind of policy is that...?
